data.title: HURLEY WELCOMES MIGUEL PUPO TO THE FAMILY
data.description: Hurley is thrilled to announce the signing of Brazilian International Miguel Pupo. The 19-year-old is coming off a career year, with impressive results at the 6-Star Prime in the Canaries and the US Open in addition to being crowned South America Pro Junior Champion. We're excited to have a surfer of his caliber now in the fold, adding to a roster already chock full of Junior talent. Expect big things from this Brazilian rising star. Video: Tom Aiello
